Package org.jlab.kafka.eventsource

Class EventSourceConfig

java.lang.Object
org.apache.kafka.common.config.AbstractConfig
org.jlab.kafka.eventsource.EventSourceConfig
public class EventSourceConfig extends AbstractConfig
Configuration for an EventSourceTable. All ConsumerConfig properties are valid, but a few default value overrides are set here. The EventSourceConfig specific (non ConsumerConfigs) include: TOPIC_CONFIG, HIGH_WATER_TIMEOUT_CONFIG, HIGH_WATER_UNITS_CONFIG, COMPACTED_CACHE_CONFIG, RESUME_OFFSET_CONFIG, and POLL_MS_CONFIG.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    AUTO_OFFSET_RESET_CONFIG
    auto.offset.reset - What to do when there is no initial offset in Kafka or if the current offset does not exist any more on the server.
    static final String
    BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS_CONFIG
    bootstrap.servers - Comma-separated list of host and port pairs that are the addresses of the Kafka brokers used to query the TOPIC.
    static final String
    COMPACTED_CACHE_CONFIG
    compacted.cache - Whether the EventSourceTable should accumulate an in-memory compacted cache (potentially memory intensive).
    static final String
    ENABLE_AUTO_COMMIT_CONFIG
    enable.auto.commit - If true the consumer's offset will be periodically committed in the background.
    static final String
    GROUP_ID_CONFIG
    group.id - Name of Kafka consumer group to use when monitoring the TOPIC.
    static final String
    HIGH_WATER_TIMEOUT_CONFIG
    high.water.timeout - Timeout for determining high water offset.
    static final String
    HIGH_WATER_UNITS_CONFIG
    high.water.units - High water timeout TimeUnit String literal; must match exactly for TimeUnit.valueOf().
    static final String
    KEY_DESERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG
    key.deserializer - Class name of deserializer to use for the key.
    static final String
    MAX_POLL_RECORDS_CONFIG
    max.poll.records - The maximum number of records returned in a single call to poll(), and also the maximum batch size returned to the batch call-back.
    static final String
    POLL_MS_CONFIG
    poll.ms - The amount of time in milliseconds to block waiting for input.
    static final String
    RESUME_OFFSET_CONFIG
    resume.offset - The offset to resume, or -1 to start from the beginning.
    static final String
    TOPIC_CONFIG
    event.source.topic - Name of Kafka event source topic to monitor.
    static final String
    VALUE_DESERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG
    value.deserializer - Class name of deserializer to use for the value.

    Fields inherited from class org.apache.kafka.common.config.AbstractConfig

    CONFIG_PROVIDERS_CONFIG
